DOC.brief_summary: This study will assess, over a 4-week treatment period, the safety and efficacy of the addition of sitagliptin to metformin in participants with type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM) who failed to achieve glycemic control on metformin monotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: A Local Experiential Study With Sitagliptin (an Antihyperglycemic Drug) in 30 Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (0431-178)
DOC.criteria: Participants with T2DM failing metformin monotherapy Between the ages of 18 and 79 Participants has a history of type 1 Diabetes Mellitus or ketoacidosis
